DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: U.S.-Germany Deal Protested : The United States has sealed a controversial telecommunications deal with Germany that lifted U.S. sanctions but prompted the European Union to initiate proceedings against Bonn , officials said . The trade officials could recall no case of a member state breaking_with European ranks over commerce . While word of a possible deal first surfaced last summer , its formal execution caught some European officials short .
